entry.title: Let's deploy BIP65 CHECKLOCKTIMEVERIFY!
entry.summary: In an email dated October 5, 2015, Clément Elbaz discussed the accuracy of obtaining results about the existence of every block and transaction using certain assumptions. However, the nature of some transactions may not be accurately represented, particularly those without enough confirmations. It is also noted that balances of some wallets may be incorrect if they do not wait for enough confirmations.
